Pricing is not about always offering the lowest price. It is about convincing the customer of the cost advantage of  your shop.
There are 4 pricing strategies. 1. Bundling 2. Advisory services 3. Diversifying revenue streams and 4. Adjusting your price up / down.
Bundling combines a product / service into a single unit for a discounted price that is cheaper than the sum of the individual prices.
Advisory services may include proper use of pesticides, fertilizers, and new technologies. Diversifying revenue helps to provide financial stability.
Finally, sometimes you may need to adjust the prices up or down. Review your pricing strategies with your ALP coach.
